mapper.sql: id, org_structure_id, android_device_policy_id, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, delete_time

mapper.update:
update android_device_department
org_structure_id = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update android_device_department set org_structure_id = #{orgStructureId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, android_device_policy_id = #{androidDevicePolicyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_time = #{deleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.org_structure_id as orgStructureId from android_device_department t1 where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update android_device_department set delete_time = now() where android_device_policy_id = #{id} and delete_time is null
mapper.select: select t1.org_structure_id as orgStructureId from android_device_department t1 where t1.delete_time is null and t1.android_device_policy_id = #{id}

select t1.id, t1.org_structure_id as orgStructureId, t1.android_device_policy_id as androidDevicePolicyId, t1.update_date as updateDate, t1.create_date as createDate from android_device_department t1 left join android_device_policy t2 on t1.android_device_policy_id = t2.id where t1.delete_time is null and t2.delete_time is null and t1.org_structure_id = #{params.departId} and t2.org_id = #{params.orgId} and t2.is_enable = 1 and t1.android_device_policy_id != #{params.id} order by t1.update_date desc
